text: nishchay hee hamane bahut-se jinnon aur manushyon ko jahannam hee ke lie phaila rakha hai. unake paas dil hai jinase ve samajhate nahin, unake paas aankhen hai jinase ve dekhate nahin; unake paas kaan hai jinase ve sunate nahin. ve pashuon kee tarah hai, balki ve unase bhee adhik pathabhrasht hai. vahee log hai jo gafalat mein pade hue hai
